titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Ms. Coll. 390 Item 2754: Dhuṇḍirāja

notesStmt.note: A short hymn to Gaṇeśa. Title inferred from colophon and title abbreviation on upper left of f. 1v ("dhuṁ* rā*"). Correct spelling would be Ḍhuṇḍhirāja.
Good condition. Written on yellow paper. Right edge badly torn. Mistakes covered over with yellow or blotched out with black. One marginal correction.
Begins: śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ umāgaṁgajaṁ karṇavaktraṁ gaṇeśaṁ bhūjākaṁkaṇaṁ śobhitaṁ dhumraketuṁ gale hāramuktā[-]phalāśobhivaṁ taṁ namo jñānarūpaṁ gaṇeśaṁ namaste 1
Ends: taṁ namo jñānarūpaṁ gaṇeśaṁ namaste 8

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts
